header.title: LAPTOPS & DESKTOPS
header.content: Razer systems are crafted to provide the ultimate performance for gaming and work. Enjoy desktop power made mobile with our gaming and productivity laptops, or go all-out for your build as you assemble the most powerful aRGB Chroma powered battlestation.

content.title: DESKTOPS & COMPONENTS
content.content: Engineered for enthusiasts and designed for performance

header.title: PERIPHERALS
header.content: The most powerful rigs mean nothing without the high-performance gear to match. Understand what it means to wield the unfair advantage as you experience industry-leading levels of precision, control, and immersion.

content.title: MICE
content.content: Pixel-perfect precision for any hand size and grip style

content.title: MOUSE MATS
